00045 #include <avr32/io.h>
00046 #include "compiler.h"
00047 #include "intc.h"
00048 
00049 
00051 extern void _evba;
00052 
00053 
00054 void INTC_register_interrupt(__int_handler handler, unsigned int irq, unsigned int int_lev)
00055 {
00056   // Program the IPRX register of the IRQ group to set the interrupt priority
00057   // level and the interrupt vector offset that will be fetched by the core
00058   // interrupt system.
00059   AVR32_INTC.ipr[irq / AVR32_INTC_MAX_NUM_IRQS_PER_GRP] =
00060     ((((U32)handler - (U32)&_evba) << AVR32_INTC_IPR0_OFFSET_OFFSET) & AVR32_INTC_IPR0_OFFSET_MASK) |
00061     ((int_lev << AVR32_INTC_IPR0_INTLEV_OFFSET) & AVR32_INTC_IPR0_INTLEV_MASK);
00062 }
